opponent.label: Yumeko
opponent.description: A strange girl with a knack for games of chance, the first and last thoughts on Yumeko's mind are always about the luck of the draw. It's not like she suffers from a gambling addiction... because she enjoys having one.

epilogue.hint: LOSE a game where Yumeko's the winner. Once again, don't try to cheese it.
LOSE a game where Yumeko's the winner. Once again, don't try to cheese it.
